about: An initial implementation of the cioos-siooc CKAN dataset schema

dataset_fields.help_text: unique id for the dataset (GUID or Title)

form_placeholder.fr: par exemple: quelques notes utiles sur les données
form_placeholder.en: eg. Some useful notes about the data

form_placeholder.fr: p. ex. économie, santé mentale, gouvernement

dataset_fields.label: Citation
dataset_fields.help_text: Citation information in json format or DOI URL. See https://citation.js.org/demo/ for acceptable inputs

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: License definitions and additional information can be found at http://opendefinition.org/

repeating_subfields.label: Parent or Linked Dataset identifier
repeating_subfields.help_text: Enter a dataset full URL or DOI

dataset_fields.label: Metadata Dates
dataset_fields.help_text: Dates related to the metadata record

dataset_fields.label: Resource Dates
dataset_fields.help_text: Dates related to the dataset resource

dataset_fields.label: Point of Contact
dataset_fields.help_text: Individual or Organization who is the primary contact for this dataset

repeating_subfields.label: Affiliation
repeating_subfields.hint: name of orginization or affiliation if individual name is used

dataset_fields.label: Responsible Party
dataset_fields.help_text: All individuals and organizations who contributed to the dataset and thus should appear in the citation

repeating_subfields.label: Affiliation
repeating_subfields.hint: name of orginization or affiliation if individual name is used

dataset_fields.label: Distributor
dataset_fields.help_text: All individuals and organizations who disseminate copies of the resource in either electronic or print form

repeating_subfields.label: Affiliation
repeating_subfields.hint: name of orginization or affiliation if individual name is used

dataset_fields.label: Default Locale
dataset_fields.help_text: Default language used in this datasets metadata

dataset_fields.label: Citation identifier
dataset_fields.help_text: If usind a doi url place the while url in the code section. example: http://doi.org/12345.67890#1

dataset_fields.label: XML Metadata File Location
dataset_fields.help_text: (Recomended) URL for the external xml metadata file which represents the full cioos metadata reocrd. This is often the same file used to create this record if the dataset is generated using the spatial harvester. If using the api to create datasets this field will not be set automaticly.

dataset_fields.label: External Harvest Document Content
dataset_fields.help_text: (Optional) Contents of external full xml metadata file. This field is populated from the XML Metadata File Location URL during harvest

dataset_fields.label: Initial dataset map max zoom level
dataset_fields.help_text: (Optional) Sets the initial maxamum zoom level in the spatial map when viewing this dataset

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data
